 2015-11742015-07-31,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActControlled Drugs and Substances Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (Part J — Salvia Divinorum)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (PART J — SALVIA DIVINORUM) in order to protect the health and safety of Canadians, particularly youth, by setting out controls under the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act on activities with S. divinorum, including its sale.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0210 Publication Date: 2015-08-12
AttachmentsAttachment
